title: Armchair Theatre – Various Episodes - in color (1956-1974, British TV series, suspense)

sources.title: Armchair Theatre – Various Episodes - in color (1956-1974, British TV series, suspense)
sources.description: Armchair Theatre is a British television drama anthology series of single plays that ran on the ITV network from 1956 to 1974. It was originally produced by ABC Weekend TV. Its successor Thames Television took over from mid-1968.
